header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Software engineer with six years of experience building scalable data platforms and ETL/ELT pipelines processing millions of events daily. Expertise in Python, SQL, AWS, Databricks, and Spark delivering data products for dozens of engineering teams. AWS certified with a proven track record of improving data platform reliability and quality.

experience.title: Software Engineer II - Streaming Data Platform
experience.detail: Built ETL/ELT workflows processing millions of daily events using AWS Kinesis, DynamoDB, PostgreSQL, Databricks, and Spark to power analytics dashboards and ML workflows for dozens of teams across Disney+ and Hulu

Designed a schema registry with AWS Smithy ensuring data quality through automated compatibility validation, and implemented data lineage tracking using OpenLineage and Marquez for enterprise-wide data governance
Developed SQL data models for a stream-snapshot state management system integrated into a unified content metadata catalog serving television, movie, and sports content
Established CI/CD pipelines for automated schema validation and testing, reducing deployment errors by 80%, and conducted daily code reviews

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Built a transaction streaming service with MongoDB and a Protobuf API enabling real-time blockchain data indexing and analytics for supply chain verification
Developed a transaction streaming client with a custom querying DSL, and built a React UI for querying and viewing transaction data

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Built an event-sourced change management system with Kafka streams enabling real-time data synchronization between a construction management platform and an enterprise resource management system
Designed SQL data models in MSSQL for construction workflows and developed full-stack solutions with C# ASP.NET APIs and Angular interfaces on Azure
Created analytics dashboards providing insights into project performance, change order trends, and submittal cycle times for data-driven decision making

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Built a test automation framework for data quality validation with API testing and Selenium-based UI testing across a microservices architecture
Executed performance testing using JMeter and Locust to simulate thousands of concurrent users, reducing production data quality issues by 60%

skills.skill: SQL & Database Design (PostgreSQL, MSSQL, DynamoDB, MongoDB)
AWS Services (Kinesis, S3, DynamoDB, IAM, PostgreSQL)
